INAUGURAL.Definition: marking the beginning of an institution, activity, or period of office

MAXIMISE.Definition: make the most of, get the most benefit from

‍AVID.Definition: very keen, wanting to do something very much

‍UNFORGIVING.Definition: not easy, not making any compromises for people who might not understand

‍CONDENSE.Definition: express (written or spoken material) in fewer words; make concise

DULLED DOWN.Definition: made into a more plain and boring version

‍ARTIFICIALLY.Definition: in a way that isn’t real

‍AUTHENTIC.Definition: real, like you would find in the real world

‍A TASTER.Definition: a small trial, a small taste
